QuestData.Title: No Weapons For You!
QuestData.Description: The Grimtotem want to fight? Let us see how well they do without their weapons.$B$BI'm sure you must have something that burns. Set their weapon racks ablaze, my $c friend.$B$BLet nature take its course.
QuestData.CompletionText: We shall have to burn more of their weapon racks than that if we are to put a dent in their ability to fight.
QuestData.RewardText: Let us see how well they fight without their weapons.
